mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer_level_distribute ( company_id, level_id, num, total, centage, create_time, target_date ) SELECT res.company_info_id AS company_id, IFNULL(res.store_level_id,-1) AS level_id, IFNULL(res.customerNum,0) AS num, IFNULL(res1.allNum,0) AS total, IFNULL(CONCAT( CONVERT ( IFNULL(res.customerNum,0) / IFNULL(res1.allNum,0) * 100, DECIMAL ( 15, 2 ) ), '%' ),0) AS centage, now() as create_time, #{targetDate} as target_date FROM ( SELECT count( cd.customer_id ) AS customerNum, sl.level_name, sl.store_level_id, scr.store_id, scr.company_info_id, s.store_name FROM replay_store_customer_rela scr LEFT JOIN replay_store_level sl ON sl.store_level_id = scr.store_level_id LEFT JOIN replay_store s ON s.store_id = sl.store_id LEFT JOIN replay_customer c ON c.customer_id = scr.customer_id LEFT JOIN replay_customer_detail cd ON cd.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE c.check_state = 1 AND cd.del_flag = 0 AND DATE_FORMAT( c.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) <= #{targetDate} GROUP BY sl.store_level_id, scr.company_info_id ) res LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count( cd.customer_id ) allNum, s.store_id, s.store_name FROM replay_store_customer_rela scr LEFT JOIN replay_store_level sl ON sl.store_level_id = scr.store_level_id LEFT JOIN replay_store s ON s.store_id = scr.store_id LEFT JOIN replay_customer c ON c.customer_id = scr.customer_id LEFT JOIN replay_customer_detail cd ON cd.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE c.check_state = 1 AND cd.del_flag = 0 AND DATE_FORMAT( c.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) <= #{targetDate} GROUP BY sl.store_id ) AS res1 ON res1.store_id = res.store_id GROUP BY res.store_level_id, res.company_info_id ORDER BY res.company_info_id, res.store_level_id

INSERT INTO customer_level_distribute ( company_id, level_id, num, total, centage, create_time, target_date ) SELECT res.companyId AS company_id, IFNULL(res1.customer_level_id,-1) AS level_id, IFNULL(res1.num,0) AS num, IFNULL(res.num,0) AS total, IFNULL(CONCAT( CONVERT ( IFNULL(res1.num,0) / IFNULL(res.num,0) * 100, DECIMAL ( 15, 2 ) ), '%' ),0) AS centage, now( ) AS create_time, #{targetDate} as target_date FROM ( SELECT count( rc.customer_id ) AS num, 0 AS companyId FROM replay_customer rc LEFT JOIN replay_customer_detail rcd ON rc.customer_id = rcd.customer_id LEFT JOIN replay_customer_level rcl ON rcl.customer_level_id = rc.customer_level_id WHERE rc.check_state = 1 AND rc.del_flag = 0 AND DATE_FORMAT( rc.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) <= #{targetDate} ) res LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count( rc.customer_id ) AS num, rcl.customer_level_id, 0 AS companyId FROM replay_customer rc LEFT JOIN replay_customer_detail rcd ON rc.customer_id = rcd.customer_id LEFT JOIN replay_customer_level rcl ON rcl.customer_level_id = rc.customer_level_id WHERE rc.check_state = 1 and rcl.del_flag = 0 AND rc.del_flag = 0 AND DATE_FORMAT( rc.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) <= #{targetDate} GROUP BY rcl.customer_level_id ) res1 ON res1.companyId = res.companyId
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT level_id AS levelId, num, total, centage, company_id AS companyId, create_time AS createTime FROM customer_level_distribute WHERE target_date = #{date} AND company_id = #{companyId}
